subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: If there was ever a day for a promising American teenage tennis player to plot an ascendant career path, to dream big at the U.S. Open, Monday presented a forecast that was sunny and bright.
snippet: If there was ever a day for a promising American teenage tennis player to plot an ascendant career path, to dream big at the U.S. Open, Monday presented a forecast that was sunny and bright.
